email_content:
Dear CodeCrafters Team,

Thank you for your continued partnership with Trustworthy Banking Group. As requested, please find below the information you need for the upcoming software upgrade.

1. General Statistics on Customer Satisfaction
   • 2021 annual survey: 85 % overall customer satisfaction.  Key positives – friendly staff & efficient service.  Areas for improvement – shorter wait times and expanded online-banking options.
   • Most recent Q4 snapshot: 90 % satisfaction rate, reflecting a 5 % quarter-on-quarter improvement.

2. Branch Performance Metrics (Q4)
   • Total customer transactions: 120,000 (↑ 5 % vs. Q3).
   • All key performance indicators are on or above target across the Downtown, Westside, Eastville and Northend branches.

3. Recent Audit Reports Impacting Requirements
   • Downtown – Ledger reconciliation delays (≈ $20 k variance).  Corrective action plan in place; staff retrained.
   • Westside – Missing signatures/approvals on several high-value accounts.  Documentation process tightened and staff re-certified.
   • Eastville – Incomplete electronic-transaction audit trails.  Interim software patch deployed; full audit-trail capability a key requirement for the new upgrade.
   • Northend – Gaps in secure storage of confidential documents.  New information-security policies rolled out; additional encryption & access-control measures required in the upgraded system.

4. Current Digital Infrastructure Overview
   • Centralised legacy database handling all customer transactions and data storage.
   • Performance bottlenecks and limited security features have been noted – particularly around audit-trail logging and encryption.
   • Objectives for the upgrade:  
        – Enhanced security (end-to-end encryption, role-based access control).  
        – Improved transaction-processing speed and scalability.  
        – Full audit-trail capture & reporting.  
        – Modern API layer to support expanded online-banking features.

Please let me know if you require any additional detail or supporting documentation. I’m happy to schedule a call at your convenience to walk through the above or discuss next steps.

Best regards,
John [Last-Name]
Trustworthy Banking Group
john@example.com
